resources.string: To call for a taxi, please dial:

Funäsfjällen is one of Swedens largest ski areas with 134 ski slopes on one ski pass. By using the ski bus you can easily reach most of them. By using the ski bus when cross-country skiing in Funäsfjällens more than 300 kilometers of tracks, you reach further out on the mountain. In the area you can of course do lots of other things like horseback riding, ice-fishing, ice-climbing, or go snow mobiling. If you wan´t mare tips and ideas, please go to our web-site funasfjallen.se or call our tourist information on 0684 - 155 80
